You can write `bar(x) = (y,z) -> foo(x,y,z)`, without giving baz a name

You can also give `baz` an internal local name if you like:
```julia> foo(x, y, z) = x + y - z;

julia> bar(x) = baz(y, z) = foo(x, y, z);

julia> bar(1)(2, 3)
0

julia> bar(1)
(::var"#baz#6"{Int64}) (generic function with 1 method)```
